lead_paragraph: A group of Texas Tech alumni has set up a fund to pay the $10,000 fine levied against Coach Mike Leach by the Big 12 last week. The conference assessed Leach its largest fine after he condemned the officiating crew in the Red Raiders’ 59-43 loss at Texas on Nov. 10.
